page.title: 19St. Bartholemews
page.content: St Bartholemews Church is situated to the west of the London Road, shopping centre. It was opened on September 8th, 1874 and is so large that it dominates the skyline. People say that it was built to the dimensions of Noah's Ark, which it looks like if you imagine it upside down. The stained glass windows are fascinating. They are set very high in the side walls and each tell a different story. the great circular window is also very beautiful. Above the main door is a small figure of St Bartholemew. In his hand he holds a model of the church.
